#summary Definition of GeoBloc instances XML file.

= GeoBloc instances DTD =

Original file can be downloaded here: http://ull-etsii-geobloc.googlecode.com/files/GeoBlocInstancesDTD_1.xml

*WARNING: I'm sure it's not 100% correct, it's my first DTD after all.*

{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!ELEMENT gb_instance (gb_scheme, gb_device, gb_form, gb_formVersion, gb_page+)>
  <!ELEMENT gb_page (gb_field|gb_singleChoiceList|gb_multipleChoiceList|gb_checkbox|gb_checkboxthree|gb_binary|gb_location)*>
    <!ELEMENT gb_field (#PCDATA)>
    <!ELEMENT gb_singleChoiceList selected_value>
      <!ELEMENT selected_value (#PCDATA)>
    <!ELEMENT gb_multipleChoiceList selected_values>
      <!ELEMENT selected_values gb_listItem+>
        <!ELEMENT gb_listItem (#PCDATA)>
    <!ELEMENT gb_checkbox (#PCDATA)>
    <!ELEMENT gb_checkboxthree (#PCDATA>
    <!ELEMENT gb_binary (#PCDATA)>
    <!ELEMENT gb_location (longitutde, latitude)>
      <!ELEMENT longitude (#PCDATA)>
      <!ELEMENT latitude (#PCDATA)>
    
    
<!-- Attributes -->
<!ATTLIST gb_instance
    schemeFile CDATA #REQUIRED
    device CDATA #REQUIRED
    formID CDATA #REQUIRED
    formVersion CDATA #REQUIRED
    complete CDATA #REQUIRED
>

<!ATTLIST gb_page
    id CDATA #REQUIRED
    type (data|gps|photo|video|audio) #REQUIRED
>

<!ATTLIST gb_field
    id CDATA #REQUIRED
    value CDATA #REQUIRED
>

<!ATTLIST gb_singleChoiceList
    id CDATA #REQUIRED
>

<!ATTLIST selected_value
    id CDATA #REQUIRED
    value CDATA #REQUIRED
>

<!ATTLIST gb_multipleChoiceList
    id CDATA #REQUIRED
>

<!ATTLIST gb_listItem
    id CDATA #REQUIRED
    value CDATA #REQUIRED
>

<!ATTLIST gb_checkbox
    id CDATA #REQUIRED
    value (0|1) #REQUIRED
>
}}}

Please commment so I can correct any mistakes.
